meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to one quarter of an acre.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted crops on several roods of land.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent estimated the property to be around five roods in size.
meanings.sent3: The roods of land were so tiny, they could fit in the palm of his hand.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening spread across the roods of her backyard like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The roods of the field stretched out as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: A crucifix or cross, especially one set on a beam in a church.
meanings.sent1: The old church displayed a beautiful roods above the altar.
meanings.sent2: People gathered around the roods during the Easter service.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to climb up to touch the roods but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The roods in the church seemed to watch over the congregation with a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the roods captured the attention of all who entered the church.
